verses.plain: It is a good thing to give thanks unto the LORD, and to sing praises unto thy name, O most High:

tokens.t: , and to sing praises unto thy name, O most High:

verses.plain: To shew forth thy lovingkindness in the morning, and thy faithfulness every night,

tokens.t: To shew forth thy lovingkindness in the morning, and thy faithfulness every night,

verses.plain: Upon an instrument of ten strings, and upon the psaltery; upon the harp with a solemn sound.

tokens.t: Upon an instrument of ten strings, and upon the psaltery; upon the harp with a solemn sound.

verses.plain: For thou, LORD, hast made me glad through thy work: I will triumph in the works of thy hands.

tokens.t: , hast made me glad through thy work: I will triumph in the works of thy hands.

verses.plain: O LORD, how great are thy works! and thy thoughts are very deep.
A brutish man knoweth not; neither doth a fool understand this.

tokens.t: A brutish man knoweth not; neither doth a fool understand this.

verses.plain: When the wicked spring as the grass, and when all the workers of iniquity do flourish; it is that they shall be destroyed for ever:

tokens.t: When the wicked spring as the grass, and when all the workers of iniquity do flourish;
that they shall be destroyed for ever:

verses.plain: But thou, LORD, art most high for evermore.
For, lo, thine enemies, O LORD, for, lo, thine enemies shall perish; all the workers of iniquity shall be scattered.

tokens.t: , for, lo, thine enemies shall perish; all the workers of iniquity shall be scattered.

verses.plain: But my horn shalt thou exalt like the horn of an unicorn: I shall be anointed with fresh oil.

tokens.t: But my horn shalt thou exalt like
an unicorn: I shall be anointed with fresh oil.

verses.plain: Mine eye also shall see my desire on mine enemies, and mine ears shall hear my desire of the wicked that rise up against me.

tokens.t: of the wicked that rise up against me.

verses.plain: The righteous shall flourish like the palm tree: he shall grow like a cedar in Lebanon.

tokens.t: The righteous shall flourish like the palm tree: he shall grow like a cedar in Lebanon.

verses.plain: Those that be planted in the house of the LORD shall flourish in the courts of our God.

tokens.t: Those that be planted in the house of the
shall flourish in the courts of our God.

verses.plain: They shall still bring forth fruit in old age; they shall be fat and flourishing;

tokens.t: They shall still bring forth fruit in old age; they shall be fat and flourishing;

verses.plain: To shew that the LORD is upright: he is my rock, and there is no unrighteousness in him.

footnotes.text: the harp…: or, the solemn sound with the harp
